Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{3: '"Cannot understand." "Cannot explain." "Cannot agree."'}
{3: 'As incomprehensible as the mechanoids may be, you can still tell that these are the words in their heads right now.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The bound mechanoids sit side by side, staring forward motionlessly as if out of power.'}
{3: 'Before them is a canvas so large that you have to look up slightly to see the whole picture from where you are.'}
{3: 'As for how you feel about the painting... you feel the same as the mechanoids who are "forced" to appreciate it: exhaustion overwhelms you just by looking at it.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'But Lee is still explaining it tirelessly like a patient professor in a lecture hall.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Can you see it? What does this represent?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Awakened Machine A', 3: '****! What do you represent?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A mechanoid shouts, unable to stand it any longer.'}
{3: 'The restraints on him start to crackle. Still, swimming pool mechanoids are not designed with combat in mind, so his struggles are inevitably futile.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Feel free to ask me if you don't understand it, leader of...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: "This is the leader of the Fantastical Mechanical Impressionists, Lee. He might be too prideful to admit he doesn't understand it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Awakened Machine A', 3: 'Prideful my ***!', 4: '1'}
{3: "You feel like that mechanoid's head is steaming. The small monitor on his back displays jumbled letters as if he is too angry for his programs to work properly."}
{2: 'Awakened Machine A', 3: 'Do you have any idea what you drew?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee stares at him questioningly...'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine A', 3: 'My visual sensors are fine!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lee turns toward Mark, but only then does he realize that Mark has been facing away from the canvas this whole time.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lee is on his own.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Technically, I didn't draw this. A program I wrote did.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine A', 3: "Don't blame the program! Even a picture of randomized pixels wouldn't look as hellish as this.", 4: '2'}
{3: "The laser from the mechanoid's rangefinder points to the top right corner of the canvas."}
{2: 'Awakened Machine A', 3: 'What is that being with the twisted wings and a blurred face?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's Mark done in the way of Fantastical Mechanical Impressionism.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Mark keeps looking away, forcing himself not to turn around.'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine A', 3: 'What about those three puppets that look infected?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's me and two other mechanoids done in the way of Surrealist Mechanical Fauvism.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine A', 3: 'And those flesh cubes that got mashed together?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'That is the commandant done in the way of Multidimensional Mechanical Cubism.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine A', 3: 'How can you mix them all together?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I believe that if we were to win this "war" with art, we must deploy the styles from all Schools.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'That is the only way all Schools can compete with each other. This is the only way we can ensure a dignified victory.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Awakened Machine B', 3: 'Excuse me.', 5: '1'}
{3: 'Asks the mechanoid whose head display is showing white noise. He sits straight as if he has just finished taking deep breaths.'}
{3: 'Designed for combat, he looks menacing even when tied up.'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine B', 3: 'It seems to me that we may have found a reason why this painting looks like an empty shell. Could it be because this painting is created purely by a program?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine B', 3: "That won't do.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Awakened Machine A', 3: "No, it won't. We don't think that a soulless piece of art like this deserves victory.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee hesitates for a second before remembering something.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Isn't the artwork you created technically done by a program, too...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine A', 3: '...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I shouldn't have said that, should I?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Beep—beep—beep—'}
{3: 'The head displays of the awakened machines shut down before turning on again, displaying a crying face.'}
{3: 'The metallic bodies keep smacking the ground while the bound feet flop around like a fish out of water.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Awakened Machine A', 3: 'There are substances inside this body! Substances! Do you even know what the soul of an artist is?!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Awakened Machine B', 3: "Aren't you humans just a mixture of water and proteins and stuff as well? Why would you say something so hurtful?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Wait. I didn't mean that.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Awakened Machine B', 3: 'You must think this "war" is just a game, don\'t you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine A', 3: 'Programs can also create something soulful, dammit.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine B', 3: "We'll never let this kind of art win...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'The mechanoids slam into each other in their strange, bound positions, causing a chaotic scene.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'Aye-yi-yi-yi-yi! Why are the leaders fighting like children now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mark the Great', 3: "Oh? The Fantastical Mechanical Impressionist is being suppressed! This can't go on!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Split them up.', 3: '93'}
{2: "They're gonna hurt the smaller mechanoids.", 3: '94'}
{3: 'Members of Neo-Multidimensional Mechanical Cubism immediately rush in, dragging the bound awakened machines away from the fight.'}
{3: 'But that does not seem to put a stop to it.'}
{3: '"Argh! Who kicked my antenna?!"'}
{3: '"Stop hitting my display, you ******!"'}
{2: 'Stop fighting! Stop fighting!', 3: '102'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: "This isn't how you win!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'Understood. Shutting up now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Give me a hand, Lee.', 3: '107'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory670.jpg'}
{3: 'This riot within a riot does not stop until late at night.'}
{3: 'Thanks to the stationed members from the other forces and the mechanoids who came to volunteer, you managed to salvage the situation before it was too late.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Mark has gotten a new arm to replace the one he lost in the chaos.'}
{3: 'Spinning his arm, he curiously inspects the Babylonia-made product.'}
{3: 'The Engineering Force has also begun repairing the damaged infrastructure of the city.'}
{2: "What's wrong, Lee?", 3: '125'}
{3: 'Lee hesitates to speak, his eyes avoiding yours.'}
{2: '(Get him talking with your gaze)', 3: '127'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lee holds his ground briefly before sighing and answering you apologetically.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm sorry, Commandant. I screwed up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I shouldn't have said something like that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I was hoping to talk to them openly. I didn't expect it to end like that.", 4: '1'}
{2: "You weren't wrong.", 3: '134'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: "If we don't interact with them earnestly...", 3: '136'}
{2: 'The awakened machines will get more and more distant from us.', 3: '137'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Are you trying to comfort me, Commandant...?', 4: '1'}
{3: "I'm not. If it weren't for your frankness, we wouldn't have known what the awakened machines were thinking."}
{3: 'The level of their obsession with art is way beyond what Babylonia imagined.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'This human is right, Lee.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Mark has stopped toying around with his arm.'}
{2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'They disagreed with how you painted it...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mark the Great', 3: "But they didn't disagree with why you painted it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'Mark the Great thinks it is a brilliant idea to combine all Schools of art from Constellia into one painting.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'So, what I have to do now is...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mark the Great', 3: "Let's paint a new one. This time, we'll do it with our hands.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mark the Great', 3: "I can feel your sincerity, Lee. That's why I've decided to leave my mark on your next painting.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'At the same time, the members of Neo-Multidimensional Mechanical Cubism approach Lee with a rolled-up canvas.'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine', 3: 'The first ever Neo-Multidimensional Mechanical Cubist painting. We saved it from the fight earlier.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine', 3: "We'll help, too. Don't worry, Boss.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Maybe it is the way Mark tooted his own horn or how the awakened machines are covered in paints. Lee reveals a rare smile.'}
{3: "You pat Lee's shoulder, showing your encouragement."}
{2: "I'll do my best to help you, too.", 3: '165'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Of course you will, Commandant. You are the leader of Neo-Multidimensional Mechanical Cubism, after all.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are we still talking about that...?', 3: '167', 4: 'Can I retire early...?', 5: '167'}
{3: 'You imagine yourself standing behind a podium and giving a lecture on art... and you do not find that interesting at all.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'There must be facilities for exhibitions in this city if you all care about art so much.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'Do you mean our galleries?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'Art exhibitions in Constellia are always open. Let me send you the coordinates.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Looking for references?', 3: '175'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Yes. I want to further understand the art of the awakened machines.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'How do they view themselves? How do they view others?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'What do humans mean to them? What does this city and this world mean to them?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'There are many things I need to understand. Those artworks will provide me with some answers, I think.', 4: '1'}
{2: "The WGAA always says that art always contains its creator's ideas.", 3: '181'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Would you like to join me, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm sure you'll offer a lot of valuable opinions if you're there.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee looks determined. He has realized that this "riot" cannot be stopped by force.'}
{3: 'He will finish his painting and use it to deliver what he wants to say.'}
{3: 'You take out your terminal and send WGAA a mail.'}
{3: 'It is alright if you cannot understand each other for now.'}
{3: "If you keep engaging each other earnestly, you will eventually overcome the wall between you and touch each other's souls."}
{3: 'You just have to keep trying before that happens.'}
{3: 'You have to send forth even the smallest flame.'}
{3: 'Your thoughts will gather—they always do. Quietly, they will form a fire where all your paths cross.'}
{3: 'Someone will be attracted by the light. They will pause and watch it glow.'}
{3: 'They will sweep away the dust of the past and greet the familiar and strange faces.'}
